name: Emerge : Course on Basic Organic Chemistry (BOC)
description: In this course, Mohammad Kashif Alam will cover Basic Organic Chemistry (BOC). All the topics will be discussed in detail and would be helpful for all aspirants preparing for the IIT JEE exam. Learners at any stage of their preparation would be benefited from the course. The course will be taught in Hinglish and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Orientation Class & Concepts of Basic Organic Chemistry (BOC)
Classification of organic compounds & Concepts of Basic Organic Chemistry (BOC)
Nature and Bonding of Organic Molecules
All DPPs Basic Organic Chemistry and Doubt Clearing Session

author.bio: A Star faculty of IIT JEE with 11 Best Teaching Awards, Mohammad sir has been an exceptional coach to 6000 AIRs in the last 10+ years.
